name: Station Saturn
description:
A Fast-Paced Endless First Person Shooter where you go from room to room battling evil robots.

Please comment if you liked the game or have any feedback! 

Default keyboard & mouse controls:

[WASD] - Movement;
[Space] - Jump;
[Shift] - Sprint / Dash;
[C] - Slide;

[Left Mouse Button] - Fire;
[Right Mouse Button] - Melee;

[R] - Reload;
[Q] - Weapon Wheel;
[I] - Inspect weapon;

[Esc / Tab] - Pause Menu.

Default Xbox Gamepad controls:

[Left Stick] - Movement;
[Left Stick Button] - Sprint;

[A] - Jump;
[B] - Slide / Dash;
[X] - Reload;
[Y] - Inspect weapon;

[Right Trigger] - Fire;
[Left Trigger] - Melee;

[Right Bumper] - Weapon Wheel;

[Start] - Pause Menu.

Music used:

Sport Racing Car | DRIVE
Aggressive Computer Gaming | ENIGMA
Aggressive Gaming Sport | Gaming
Epic Cyberpunk | Glory
Aggressive Electro Cyberpunk | Hidden
Racing Sport Gaming | RACING

by Alex-Productions | https://onsound.eu/
